result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ambrose R. Wadzinski

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on November 15, 2022 at 08:05 am.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:33 pm. 
INCLUDES: 20CF864 & 22CF1065.

Deft appears via Zoom, pro se. 
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 

**** COURT VACATES BENCH WARRANT ****

Court notes counsel has not yet been appointed. 
Deft. waives time limits for preliminary hearing. COURT accepts waiver.
CC: 11/15/2022 @ 8:05 am, Branch 1. (to address status of counsel)

Adj: 1:37 pm.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:24 pm.
INCLUDES: 20CF864 & 22CF1065.

Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Deft. fails to appear. 
Court notes deft. appeared in court on 09/29/2022 and was advised of today's hearing date/time. Deft also signed bond which listed today's hearing date/time.
COURT ORDERS: BWA $600.00.

Adj: 1:25 pm.
SPD Attorney Status

INCLUDES 20CF864 & 22CF1065: (Cash bond already posted). No contact with victim(s): R.P. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

3:31 p.m.
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 20CF864 and 22CF1065

State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher; Defendant appears in person, pro se. 

Date and time set for a Hearing.  
**COURT QUASHES ALL WARRANTS*
ADA Brubacher notes defendant missed a RH.
Pretrial Assessor makes statement.
Defendant makes statement.
COURT questions defendant regarding counsel.
Defendant makes statement. 
ADA Brubacher makes request for bond. 
COURT ORDERS: Reinstates $500.00 cash bond with all other non-monetary conditions previously ordered on both files. 
COURT directs Defendant to contact ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.   
COURT extends time limits until next hearing.
